displayProperties.description:
Dodging leaves behind an explosive that detonates after a short delay, damaging targets around it and creating a secondary effect based on your Super's element:
• [Arc] Blinds targets.
• [Solar] Scorches targets.
• [Void] Suppresses targets.
• [Stasis] Slows targets.
• [Strand] Severs targets.
displayProperties.name: Parting Gift

displayProperties.description: Daybreak final blows create a healing and empowering Rift at the target's location. While a Solar Super is equipped, Solar weapon final blows grant Rift energy; standing in a Rift increases this energy. Final blows while in a Rift consume class ability energy to create a healing and empowering Rift at the target's location.
displayProperties.name: Embers of Light

displayProperties.description: Powered melee final blows unleash a damaging explosion. Finishers and final blows against more powerful targets increase the radius and damage of the explosion.
displayProperties.name: Spheromatik Trigger

displayProperties.description:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
displayProperties.name: Bastion Catalyst

displayProperties.description:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
displayProperties.name: Devil's Ruin Catalyst

displayProperties.description:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
displayProperties.name: Symmetry Catalyst

displayProperties.description:
Rapidly fires 3 spreads of pure force.

After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, reduced charge time, and improved reload speed for a short duration. Hitting a target with most of the pellets in a burst increases melee damage for a short duration.
displayProperties.name: Saint's Fists

displayProperties.description: Variable trigger. Press and release to fire individual shots. Hold to charge up a high-powered, [Stagger] stunning laser. Strong against Unstoppable Champions.
displayProperties.name: Close the Gap

displayProperties.description:
This weapon fires full auto.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to Arc Seeker mode. Arc Seekers track toward combatants you target.
displayProperties.name: Revolution

displayProperties.description: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants ammo to this weapon.
displayProperties.name: Lead from Gold

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants increased ammo to this weapon.
displayProperties.name: Lead from Gold

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description: Fully charging the laser refills the magazine from reserves.
displayProperties.name: Pyrogenesis

displayProperties.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves.
displayProperties.name: Clown Cartridge

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves to an improved degree.
displayProperties.name: Clown Cartridge

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description: This weapon fires [Stagger] staggering projectiles. Strong against Unstoppable Champions.
displayProperties.name: Breakthrough

displayProperties.description: Precision hits build up Dynamic Charge. Swapping to Arc Seeker mode increases damage and partially reloads the magazine based on the number of charges.
displayProperties.name: Dynamic Charge

displayProperties.description: Using your grenade ability partially refills the magazine and changes this weapon's damage type to match your grenade until you stow it.
displayProperties.name: Osmosis

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: Using your grenade ability partially refills the magazine and changes this weapon's damage type to match your grenade until you stow it. Handling is improved.
displayProperties.name: Osmosis

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped Super.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
• [Strand] increases airborne effectiveness.
displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description:
Substantially increases stats based on the currently equipped Super.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
• [Strand] increases airborne effectiveness.
displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description: Melee blocked immediately after guarding disorients and weakens the attacker.

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: Melee blocked immediately after guarding disorients and weakens the attacker. Ammo reserves increased.
displayProperties.name: Flash Counter

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description: Overheat damage is reduced while not aiming down sights.
displayProperties.name: Heat Sink

displayProperties.description:
Increases weapon handling and reload speed. Gain the following effects while you are the last living member of your fireteam:
• Increased target acquisition
• Increased handling and reload speed
• Reduced flinch from incoming fire
displayProperties.name: Celerity

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.
